André Djaoui (amụrụ na Tunis) bụ onye mmepụta, onye na-ese ihe, odee na onye nduzi ihe nkiri.

N'afọ 1992, André Djaoui so Antenne 2, Rai 2, RTVE, NHK Japan, Channel 4 UK, USA Warner video mepụta, usoro Portraits asaa nke ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị, ndị edemede, ndị na-ese ihe, ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ndị ọkà ihe ọmụma gbanwere ụwa

Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri mere nkiri ndị a maka telivishọn: Kafka nke Zbigniew Rybczynski, Darwin nke Peter Greenaway, Vivaldi nke Lina Wertmüller, Ben Gurion nke Jerry Schatzberg, Einstein nke Michael Ritchie, Chekhov nke Nikita Mikhalkov na Gershwin nke Alain Resnais.

N'afọ 1994, André Djaoui mepụtara King David, egwu egwu Broadway (okwu Tim Rice na egwu Alan Menken).
Nke a bụ akwụkwọ sitere na mkpali nke akwụkwọ nsọ Bible, ọkachasị akwụkwọ Samuel, Akwụkwọ Ihe E Mere na Akwụkwọ Abụ Ọma
E mere Eze Devid dị ka akụkụ nke ememe nke afọ pụkụ ato nke ntọala Jerusalem.
André Djaoui na-edekwa ihe maka ihe nkiri
Mgbe ha zutere Philippe Grimbert, ha dere egwuregwu akpọrọ Back.
N'afọ 2008, o kpebiri ịmalite ndụ ọhụrụ na Israel dị ka onye na-ese ihe
E gosipụtara ihe osise ya na Tel-Aviv n'afọ 2009
Ihe osise ya dịkwa na Miami kemgbe afọ 2015.
